birth_place.zh-cn: 日治朝鲜庆尚南道陜川郡
birth_place.en: Hapcheon County, South Gyeongsang Province, Japanese Korea

death_place.zh-cn: 韩国首尔西大门区延禧洞
death_place.en: Yeonhui-dong, Seodaemun District, Seoul, South Korea

description.zh-cn: 韩国陆军退役上将，大韩民国第11、12任总统。通过双十二政变上台，实行新军人权威主义的独裁统治，任内镇压了光州民主化运动。执政期间，韩国经济保持良好发展。卸任后因镇压光州事件和贪污罪被判处无期徒刑，后获时任总统金泳三特赦。
description.en: A retired Republic of Korea Army general who served as the 11th and 12th President of South Korea. He came to power through the Coup d'état of December Twelfth and established an authoritarian 'New Military' regime, during which he suppressed the Gwangju Uprising. Under his rule, South Korea's economy maintained strong growth. After leaving office, he was sentenced to life in prison for his role in the Gwangju massacre and for corruption, but was later pardoned by then-President Kim Young-sam.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，通过五一六军事政变上台。全斗焕在政变中积极支持他，成为其亲信。
description.en: Former President of South Korea who came to power through the May 16 coup. Chun Doo-hwan actively supported him during the coup and became his confidant.

description.zh-cn: 由朴正熙发动的军事政变，全斗焕在此次政变中积极支持朴正熙，为其政治生涯的开端。
description.en: A military coup led by Park Chung-hee. Chun Doo-hwan's active support for Park during this coup marked the beginning of his political career.

description.zh-cn: 韩国培养陆军军官的军事院校，全斗焕于1955年作为第11期学员毕业。
description.en: A military academy for training army officers in South Korea, from which Chun Doo-hwan graduated as a member of the 11th class in 1955.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，全斗焕的同学、政治盟友及继任者。两人共同成立“一心会”，并在双十二政变中合作。
description.en: Former President of South Korea, a classmate, political ally, and successor to Chun Doo-hwan. They co-founded the 'Hana-hoe' and collaborated in the Coup d'état of December Twelfth.

description.zh-cn: 由全斗焕和卢泰愚等陆军官校11期同学成立的军队内部秘密组织，是全斗焕发动政变和维持统治的核心力量。
description.en: A secret organization within the army founded by Chun Doo-hwan, Roh Tae-woo, and other classmates from the 11th class of the Korea Military Academy. It was the core force behind Chun's coup and his subsequent rule.

description.zh-cn: 1979年朴正熙遇刺后，由国军保安司令全斗焕发动的军事政变，使其掌握了军政大权。
description.en: Following the assassination of Park Chung-hee in 1979, this military coup was launched by Defense Security Commander Chun Doo-hwan, allowing him to seize military and political power.

description.zh-cn: 时任韩国陆军参谋总长，在双十二政变中被全斗焕逮捕。
description.en: The then-Chief of Staff of the Republic of Korea Army, who was arrested by Chun Doo-hwan during the Coup d'état of December Twelfth.

description.zh-cn: 由全斗焕宣布的全国扩大戒严，为镇压光州民主化运动和巩固其权力铺平了道路。
description.en: A nationwide expansion of martial law declared by Chun Doo-hwan, which paved the way for the suppression of the Gwangju Uprising and the consolidation of his power.

description.zh-cn: 1980年5月在韩国光州爆发的民主化运动，遭到全斗焕派遣的军队血腥镇压。
description.en: A pro-democracy movement that erupted in Gwangju, South Korea, in May 1980, which was brutally suppressed by troops dispatched by Chun Doo-hwan.

description.zh-cn: 韩国民主运动领袖及前总统。在全斗焕执政期间被逮捕入狱，后在1997年作为候任总统同意金泳三赦免全斗焕。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and former president. He was arrested and imprisoned during Chun Doo-hwan's rule, and later, as president-elect in 1997, he consented to Kim Young-sam's pardon of Chun.

description.zh-cn: 韩国民主运动领袖及前总统。在全斗焕执政期间被软禁。其执政期间，全斗焕被逮捕并判刑，后又被其特赦。
description.en: A leader of the South Korean democracy movement and former president. He was placed under house arrest during Chun Doo-hwan's rule. During his own presidency, Chun was arrested and sentenced, only to be later granted a special pardon by him.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，在全斗焕发动的政变后被迫辞职。
description.en: Former President of South Korea who was forced to resign after the coup launched by Chun Doo-hwan.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the Republic of Korea.

nodes.id: 大韩民国国军机务司令部

zh-cn: 大韩民国国军机务司令部

description.zh-cn: 韩国军队的情报和安全机构，全斗焕在担任此机构司令官期间发动政变。
description.en: The intelligence and security agency of the South Korean military. Chun Doo-hwan launched a coup while serving as its commander.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的主要情报机构，前身为中央情报部（KCIA）。
description.en: The main intelligence agency of South Korea, formerly known as the Korean Central Intelligence Agency (KCIA).

description.zh-cn: 全斗焕的夫人，韩国前第一夫人。
description.en: Wife of Chun Doo-hwan and former First Lady of South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 由全斗焕创建的韩国政党，是其执政时期的执政党。
description.en: A South Korean political party founded by Chun Doo-hwan, which served as the ruling party during his presidency.

description.zh-cn: 1987年韩国爆发的大规模民主化运动，迫使全斗焕政府接受总统直选制。
description.en: A large-scale pro-democracy movement in South Korea in 1987 that forced the Chun Doo-hwan government to accept a direct presidential election system.

description.zh-cn: 由卢泰愚发表、全斗焕接受的宣言，主要内容是实行总统直接选举，标志着韩国民主化转型的开始。
description.en: A declaration announced by Roh Tae-woo and accepted by Chun Doo-hwan, its main content being the implementation of direct presidential elections, marking the beginning of South Korea's democratic transition.

description.zh-cn: 1983年全斗焕访问缅甸期间发生的针对其的炸弹袭击事件，韩方认为是朝鲜所为。
description.en: A bombing attack targeting Chun Doo-hwan during his visit to Burma in 1983, which the South Korean side attributed to North Korea.

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 位于朝鲜半岛北部的国家，被韩方指控为仰光爆炸事件的主谋。
description.en: A country located in the northern part of the Korean Peninsula, accused by South Korea of masterminding the Rangoon bombing.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者和首任最高领导人。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 美国第40任总统，其任内取消了撤出驻韩美军的计划，强化了韩美同盟。
description.en: The 40th President of the United States, who during his term canceled plans to withdraw U.S. troops from South Korea and strengthened the ROK-U.S. alliance.

description.zh-cn: 日本前首相，其任内改善了韩日关系，并向韩国提供了大规模贷款。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Japan who improved Japan-South Korea relations and provided large-scale loans to South Korea during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的最高法院，于1997年终审判处全斗焕无期徒刑。
description.en: The highest court in South Korea, which sentenced Chun Doo-hwan to life imprisonment in its final verdict in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的法院，于1996年一审判处全斗焕死刑。
description.en: A court in South Korea that initially sentenced Chun Doo-hwan to death in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 韩国天主教神父，曾作证称在光州事件中目击军用直升机对平民扫射，后在全斗焕的回忆录中被其称为“骗子”。
description.en: A South Korean Catholic priest who testified to witnessing military helicopters firing on civilians during the Gwangju Uprising, and was later called a 'liar' by Chun Doo-hwan in his memoirs.

description.zh-cn: 位于韩国庆尚南道的一个郡，是全斗焕的出生地。
description.en: A county in South Gyeongsang Province, South Korea, and the birthplace of Chun Doo-hwan.

description.zh-cn: 1952年1月成为陆军士官军校第11期学员，1955年9月毕业。
description.en: Became a cadet of the 11th class of the Military Academy in January 1952 and graduated in September 1955.

description.zh-cn: 全斗焕在五一六军事政变时积极支持朴正熙。
description.en: Chun Doo-hwan actively supported Park Chung-hee during the May 16 coup.

description.zh-cn: 朴正熙将全斗焕视为亲信，在其执政期间多次提拔全斗焕担任要职。
description.en: Park Chung-hee regarded Chun Doo-hwan as a confidant and promoted him to key positions multiple times during his rule.

description.zh-cn: 与卢泰愚等人共同成立秘密组织“一心会”（后称新军部），并担任会长。
description.en: Co-founded the secret organization 'Hana-hoe' (later known as the New Military Group) with Roh Tae-woo and others, and served as its leader.

description.zh-cn: 与全斗焕等人共同成立秘密组织“一心会”（后称新军部）。
description.en: Co-founded the secret organization 'Hana-hoe' (later known as the New Military Group) with Chun Doo-hwan and others.

relationships.target: 大韩民国国军机务司令部

description.zh-cn: 身为国军保安司令的全斗焕发动双十二政变，全面掌握军政大权。
description.en: As the Commander of the Defense Security Command, Chun Doo-hwan launched the Coup d'état of December Twelfth, seizing full military and political power.

description.zh-cn: 政变期间，陆军参谋总长郑升和被逮捕。
description.en: During the coup, Army Chief of Staff Jeong Seung-hwa was arrested.

description.zh-cn: 全斗焕宣布全国扩大戒严，以巩固权力并镇压民主运动。
description.en: Chun Doo-hwan declared a nationwide expansion of martial law to consolidate power and suppress the democracy movement.

description.zh-cn: 全斗焕派出空降部队镇压光州民主化运动。
description.en: Chun Doo-hwan dispatched paratroopers to suppress the Gwangju Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 在5·17紧急戒严后，金大中等民主人士被拘捕入狱。
description.en: After the May 17 Emergency Martial Law, pro-democracy figures like Kim Dae-jung were arrested and imprisoned.

description.zh-cn: 在5·17紧急戒严后，金泳三等民主人士被软禁。
description.en: After the May 17 Emergency Martial Law, pro-democracy figures like Kim Young-sam were placed under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 以全斗焕为首的新军部势力通过国家保卫非常对策委员会完全控制政局，迫使时任总统崔圭夏辞职。
description.en: The New Military Group, led by Chun Doo-hwan, took complete control of the political situation through the Special Committee for National Security Measures, forcing then-President Choi Kyu-hah to resign.

description.zh-cn: 里根政府宣布取消撤出驻韩美军的计划，并承诺继续帮助韩军实现军事现代化，加强了对全斗焕政府的支持。
description.en: The Reagan administration announced the cancellation of plans to withdraw U.S. troops from South Korea and promised to continue assisting in the modernization of the South Korean military, thereby strengthening its support for the Chun Doo-hwan government.

description.zh-cn: 中曾根康弘作为首位访韩的日本首相，决定向韩国提供40亿美元贷款援助，改善了双边关系。
description.en: As the first Japanese Prime Minister to visit South Korea, Yasuhiro Nakasone decided to provide $4 billion in loan assistance to South Korea, improving bilateral relations.

relationships.source: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 韩国方面认为朝鲜是仰光爆炸事件的主谋，该事件是一起针对全斗焕的暗杀行动。
description.en: The South Korean side believes North Korea masterminded the Rangoon bombing, which was an assassination attempt against Chun Doo-hwan.

description.zh-cn: 金日成因全斗焕镇压民主运动而拒绝与其举行南北首脑会谈。
description.en: Kim Il-sung refused to hold an inter-Korean summit with Chun Doo-hwan due to his suppression of the democracy movement.

description.zh-cn: 六月民主运动的巨大压力迫使全斗焕放弃通过间接选举维持统治的计划。
description.en: The immense pressure from the June Democratic Struggle forced Chun Doo-hwan to abandon his plan to maintain power through an indirect election.

description.zh-cn: 在六月民主运动的压力下，执政党代表卢泰愚发表了六二九宣言。
description.en: Under pressure from the June Democratic Struggle, ruling party representative Roh Tae-woo issued the June 29 Declaration.

description.zh-cn: 作为全斗焕的接班人，卢泰愚发表了同意总统直选的六二九宣言。
description.en: As Chun Doo-hwan's successor, Roh Tae-woo issued the June 29 Declaration, agreeing to direct presidential elections.

description.zh-cn: 全斗焕接受了卢泰愚提出的六二九宣言。
description.en: Chun Doo-hwan accepted the June 29 Declaration proposed by Roh Tae-woo.

description.zh-cn: 金泳三执政时期，全斗焕因筹集和侵吞秘密政治资金及镇压光州事件而被逮捕。
description.en: During Kim Young-sam's presidency, Chun Doo-hwan was arrested for creating and embezzling secret political funds and for his role in the Gwangju Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 一审以军事叛乱和内乱罪、谋杀上司未遂罪及受贿罪，判处全斗焕死刑。
description.en: In the first trial, Chun Doo-hwan was sentenced to death for military rebellion, insurrection, attempted murder of a superior, and bribery.

description.zh-cn: 终审以军事叛乱、内乱罪和贪污受贿罪，改判全斗焕无期徒刑。
description.en: In the final appeal, Chun Doo-hwan's sentence was commuted to life imprisonment for military rebellion, insurrection, and bribery.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统金泳三赦免了全斗焕。
description.en: Then-President Kim Young-sam pardoned Chun Doo-hwan.

description.zh-cn: 金泳三在征得候任总统金大中的同意后，赦免了全斗焕。
description.en: Kim Young-sam pardoned Chun Doo-hwan after obtaining the consent of president-elect Kim Dae-jung.

description.zh-cn: 全斗焕在其回忆录中称已故神父曹喆铉为“骗子”，损害了其名誉。
description.en: In his memoirs, Chun Doo-hwan called the late priest Cho Cheol-hyeon a 'liar,' damaging his reputation.
